themes: broad community access to arts learning
key_phrases: I took many, many FONCA art courses/workshops in Mexico City and in Merida for almost no cost (just for the materials)
fantastic teachers, professional artists, master printmakers
programs like the one mentioned... 'create school'
knowledge is transmitted from professionals (masters) to the next generations, and to a wide audience
barriers_identified: lack of affordable, high-quality art courses/workshops led by professionals
solutions_proposed: offer low-cost art courses/workshops with professional artists and master practitioners
implement programs that facilitate intergenerational knowledge transfer in the arts
